parameters.name: Category
parameters.description:
The abbreviation of the cloud service name.

>  For more information about how to obtain the abbreviation of a cloud service name, see `metricCategory` in the response parameter `Labels` of the [DescribeProjectMeta](~~114916~~) operation.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group.

parameters.name: InstanceIdList
parameters.description: The instances to be removed from the application group. Separate multiple instances with commas (,). You can remove a maximum of 20 instances from an application group at a time.
